title: March Madness
article: March Madness or the NCAA Division I men's basketball tournament kicked off on March 21st. The action started quickly in the first round when there were some major upsets. Fourteen seed Oakland upset three seed Kentucky. Also fourteen seed Yale upset four seed Auburn.  The upsets continued in the Sweet sixteen when eleven seed NC state beat number two seed Marquette.  On March 31st NC state's hot streak continued, they beat the Duke Blue Devils.  The Final four and National championship will be surprising and unforgettable. This tournament has been so surprising that most people's brackets are very of the mark.
author: Jake Weiss
